mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_MEMO, IS_USE, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_ID FROM acm_notifications order by board_id desc LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
